articles.title: Jay Z's alleged son Rymir Satterthwaite files motion to Supreme Court amid 10-year paternity - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rymir Satterthwaite has been fighting to prove that Jay-Z is his biological father since he was 21 years old, and he is now taking that battle to the Supreme Court.
articles.content: The 30-year-old man who claims that he is the secret illegitimate son of Jay-Z has accused the world-famous rapper of abusing the legal system for more than a decade in order to avoid taking a patern… [+13083 chars]

articles.description: FEMAIL takes a look back at how Andrew and Sarah have become the closest ex-couple in the Royal Family's history - after she joined the Duke at the Windsor concert last night.
articles.content:
They've been divorced for over 27 years now - but that hasn't stopped Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson from maintaining an exceptionally close relationship.
